s: ^“Oh my god I’m in a freaking plane.”

c-0: ^Heraldus: “No more than an hour. These gyro-powered planes are pretty fast. Can’t wait to see the Nests, huh?”
c-1: ^Heraldus: “It’s... a plane? You know, the army’s plane? As in the plane that’s taking us soldiers all the way to the Nests.”
c-2: ^Heraldus: “Yeah? Are you feeling okay? Hit your head or something? Just don’t let the general find out or she’ll have you taken out of the Nest mission.”

story1b: ^Heraldus: “Yeah, you know, the Nests? Weird mutant bugs that somehow colonized a continent?
^They seem to be assembling a weapon of some sort, so it’s our job to wipe them all out.”
